author: pcl
msg: Disabling Slice tests, since they're failing the build.

author: zhen
msg: Implemented gadgets.rpc using three cross-domain RPC relay mechanisms: window.postMessage, document.postMessage, and an improved version of IFrame-based IFPC technique.
Tested in FireFox 2, FireFox 3 beta 3, Safari 3, Opera 9, IE 6, and IE 7.
Container samples and gadget features using cross-domain calls will be updated to leverage gadgets.rpc later.

author: gawor
msg: Adds a confirmation page at the end of Assembling a server. Patch from Joseph Leong (GERONIMO-3802)
